name: project-typing-game
description:
This is a typing game called StarTyper. The game scene is set in a spaceship. Players can click the START button to start the game. After the game starts, words will be displayed on the screen and the timer will start. Players need to enter the same words as on the screen in the input box. After you enter the correct word, the word on the screen will be updated. Players need to enter as many correct words as possible within the specified time. Once the timer ends or the player completes all word input, the game ends. After the game ends, the player's history record will be displayed.

This game developed by Duan.
